question: Every day or so, I experience an episode of a wave of weakness comes over me when I am sitting down and  begin eating.  I have been diagnosed previously with moderate hiatal hernia and acid reflux.  I take one 20 mg tab of Aciphex daily.  I also have type 2 diabetes, and have recently begun a weight loss program, losing 17 lbs in the last 3 months.
title: Weakness when eating
